User (API) Reference
--------------------

The pyioflash package provides the following classes as a user interface,
SimulationData and SimulationPlot. These classes, along with several options classes,
provide the methods and functionality necessary to read, manipulate, and plot the
simulation data contained in FLASH4 hdf5 output files.

The following pages document the package modules, classes, and methods in detail.
